message: Let's be fair, 60-40 is a good deal for both of us.
Your turn! I'm feeling generous, but let's make it snappy. Time is money.
You didn't take my good offer, now I have to take a bigger share. Think carefully.
Okay, Alice, let's be real. This is my last reasonable offer.  Take it before inflation eats away at everything!
I'm not afraid of inflation, you are. My share just got bigger.
